name: Stupid Bird - Cut it Puzzles
description:
The bird is thirsty and very stupid! He is only want to drink water from his glass! Your job is to draw a line to cut the shape then make the glass filled up with water!

Try to find the best way to finish each level. Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars.

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Lots of levels with more coming soon!
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
* The stupid bird is very fun, you will love it!
developers: Twin Dragons Creation & Technology Joint Stock Company
publishers: Twin Dragons Creation & Technology Joint Stock Company
